feed.title: Track Magictools Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: :video_game: :pencil: A list of Game Development resources to make magic happen.

entry.title: Magictools Updates on Jun 26 - Jul 02, 2023
entry.content:
Graphics / Vector/Image Editor

  • ğŸ†“ Charas - Charas is a charset generator for RPG Maker.
  • ğŸ’° Pixelmator - Full-featured image editing app for the Mac
  • ğŸ’° Pixelator - Turn any image into fancy pixel-art
  • ğŸ‰ SVGcode - SVGcode is a Progressive Web App that lets you convert raster images like JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, AVIF, etc. to vector graphics in SVG format.
  • ğŸ‰ VTracer - Raster to Vector Graphics Converter built on top of visioncortex

Graphics / Modeling

  • ğŸ’° 3ds Max
  • ğŸ’¸ Besel - Make a 3d real-time collaboration design and prototype in your VR headset or mobile AR.
  • ğŸ†“ Clara.io
  • ğŸ’¸ Daz 3D - A 3D software allows you to easily create custom scenes and characters in seconds.
  • ğŸ†“ sculptris - A version by Pixologic and the original 1.01
  • ğŸ†“ Womp - A 3D intuitive and easy to use for create right in your browser
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jun 26 - Jul 02, 2023

entry.content:
Graphics / Spritesheet Tools

  • ğŸ‰ EzSpriteSheet (â­48) - Creates sprite sheets from animated GIFs and more

Engines and Frameworks / Voxel Editors

  • ğŸ†“ Cocos Creator - Cocos Creator, a free cross-platform game development editor supporting Cocos2d-js, helps developers build 2D and 3D game scenes, edit game UI and other game resources quickly and efficiency.
  • ğŸ’¸ CopperCube - CopperCube is an all-in-one 3D game engine.Very easy to use.
  • ğŸ‰ Defold - Free 2D Game Engine for Cross-Platform Publishing
  • ğŸ†“ Lumberyard - Amazon Lumberyard is a free AAA game engine deeply integrated
  • ğŸ‰ nuklear (â­10k) - A single-header ANSI C immediate mode cross-platform GUI library.
  • ğŸ‰ OpenXRay (â­3.3k) - a community-modified X-Ray engine used in S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game series.
  • ğŸ‰ Pixel Vision 8 (â­1.7k) - Pixel Vision 8's core philosophy is to teach retro game development with streamlined workflows. PV8 is also a platform that standardizes 8-bit fantasy console limitations built on top of the open-source C# game engine based on MonoGame.
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jan 17 - Jan 23, 2022

entry.title: Magictools Updates on Jun 07 - Jun 13, 2021
entry.content:
Graphics / Assets/Placeholders

  • ğŸ†“ 2D Cartoon Mobile Game UI Pack - cartoon user interface asset pack. It comes as a layered psd file.
  • ğŸ†“ 420 Pixel Art Icons for RPGs - Set of 420 RPG icons, free for commercial use.
  • ğŸ†“ Blender 3D models - 3D models, particle systems/effects
  • ğŸ’¸ CGTextures - A large collection of textures.
  • ğŸ’¸ GameDev Market - a community-driven marketplace that connects indie game developers with talented asset creators.
  • ğŸ†“ Games-Icons Set - free icons for your games.
  • ğŸ†“ Iconmonstr - Another free icons resource for your games.
  • ğŸ’¸ Kenney Assets - Royalty free assets
  • ğŸ†“ Liberated Pixel Cup assets - Free graphic assets of the Liberated Pixel Cup (LPC) held by the OpenGameArt forums
  • ğŸ†“ Matcaps (â­2.9k) - A Huge library of matcap textures in PNG and ZMT, organized by color.
  • ğŸ†“ OpenGameArt - a media repository intended for use with free software game projects.
  • ğŸ’° Oryx Design Lab - Cheap high quality royalty free sprites
  • ğŸ’¸ PlainTextures - Free high resolution textures, brushes and photos
  • ğŸ†“ Reiner's Tilesets - A blog with free 2D and 3D graphics.
  • ğŸ†“ Sketchfab - Publish & embed interactive 3D models.
  • ğŸ†“ SpriteLib - a collection of static and animated graphic objects (also commonly known as sprites).
  • ğŸ†“ StickyPNG - Free transparent PNG images.
  • ğŸ†“ TextureHaven - Free textures with additional maps like displacement and bump maps. Also HDRIs.
  • ğŸ†“ TextureKing - Free material stock textures
  • ğŸ’¸ Vecteezy - Free Vector Art.

Graphics / Spritesheet Tools

  • ğŸ‰ Cheetah-Texture-Packer (â­243) - High efficient and fast 2D bin packing tool
  • ğŸ‰ Libgdx Texture Packer (â­24k) - Texture Packer built into Libgdx
  • ğŸ†“ Littera - Bitmap font generator
  • ğŸ†“ ShoeBox - Adobe Air based app with game and ui related tools.
  • ğŸ’¸ TexturePacker - Great spritesheet creation editor.
  • ğŸ‰ Tilesplit (â­3) - CLI text-based tilesheet splitter and namer. Turn a spritesheet into many separate files with names you pick, or not if you don't care. Support templates and textures that are not all the same size.

Graphics / Bitmap Compression

  • ğŸ‰ ImageAlpha â€” Mac OS X GUI for pngquant and other tools
  • ğŸ†“ PNGGauntlet - Smash PNGs for faster sites
  • ğŸ†“ PNGoo - Windows GUI for batch conversion.
  • ğŸ‰ Pngyu - simple PNG image file compression tool.
  • ğŸ’¸ TinyPNG - Advanced lossy compression for PNG images that preserves full alpha transparency.

Graphics / Texture Tools

  • ğŸ’° FilterForge - A plugin for Adobe Photoshop that allows you to build your own filters.
  • ğŸ†“ Live Normal - An Android and iOS app for generating seamless materials on the go. You take a photo, and Live Normal creates a tile-able texture and generates texture maps ready for a PBR engine of your choice.
  • ğŸ’° PixPlant - PixPlant is a smart 3D texturing tool that creates high quality normal, displacement, specular maps and seamless textures from photos.

Graphics / Tile/Level Editors

  • ğŸ’° AutoTileGen - AutoTileGen is an automatic tileset generator for 2D game terrains.
  • ğŸ‰ LDtk - LDtk is an open-source 2D level editor for indie devs, with a strong focus on user-friendliness.
  • ğŸ‰ OGMO Editor- generic level editor.
  • ğŸ‰ Overlap2D (â­785) - a 2D level and UI editor with an engine agnostic philosophy.
  • ğŸ‰ Tiled - free, easy to use and flexible tile map editor.

Graphics / Animation

  • ğŸ‰ LWF - Lightweight SWF. LWF is an animation engine which can play animation data converted from FLASH contents in HTML5, Unity, Cocos2d-x, iOS UIKit, and more.
  • ğŸ’° Mixamo - tool for auto auto rigging and animation of 3D humanoid models,

Graphics / Vector/Image Editor

  • ğŸ’° Affinity Designer - Vector graphics editor with a bunch of features which also supports Adobe file formats
  • ğŸ’° Affinity Photo - Photo and raster graphics editor which works together with Adobe file formats and Affinity Designer
  • ğŸ’¸ Aseprite - animated sprite editor & pixel art tool.
  • ğŸ‰ Gimp - GNU Image Manipulation Program. It is a freely distributed piece of software for such tasks as photo retouching, image composition and image authoring.
  • ğŸ‰ Inkscape - An open-source vector graphics editor similar to Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, Freehand, or Xara X.
  • ğŸ‰ Krita - Krita is a professional FREE and open source painting program. It is made by artists that want to see affordable art tools for everyone.
  • ğŸ‰ LibreSprite - LibreSprite is an open source fork of Aseprite.
  • ğŸ†“ Multipaint - A cross-platform (Win, Linux, Mac) image editor/painter which covers the color limitations of 8-bit machines (like C64, ZX Spectrum etc.)
  • ğŸ’¸ Paint.NET - Paint.NET is free image and photo editing software for PCs that run Windows.
  • ğŸ’° Pickle - Another Pixel art Editor.
  • ğŸ‰ PiskelApp - Free Online Pixel Art and Animated Sprite Tool.
  • ğŸ’° Pixen (â­931) - Pixel Art Editor for OSX
  • ğŸ†“ project one - A picture converter and editor for the Commodore 64 covering different graphics mode of this computer. Windows only
  • ğŸ’° PyxelEdit - Pixel art editor designed to make it fun and easy to make tilesets, levels and animations.
  • ğŸ†“ REXPaint - a powerful and user-friendly ASCII art editor.
  • ğŸ‰ rx - a modern & minimalist pixel editor
  • ğŸ†“ Tilemancer - A quick procedural tile creator designed for pixel-art games.
  • ğŸ†“ Timanthes - A pixel art editor for the Commodore 64 computer running on Windows
  • ğŸ†“ Spritemate - Online Editor for Commodore 64 Sprites

Graphics / Modeling

  • ğŸ†“ MakeHuman
  • ğŸ’° Maya
  • ğŸ’° modo

Graphics / Terrain Generators

  • ğŸ†“ Canyon Terrain Editor - Create quality, realistic terrain quickly and intuitively
  • ğŸ‰ DEM Net Elevation API - Live 3D textured terrain generation from real data - export height/normal maps, glTF, OBJ, STL
  • ğŸ‰ Fracplanet - Fractal planet and terrain generator
  • ğŸ’° World Creator - Procedural terrain and landscape generation on the GPU in real time, simulation of erosion and sediment, beautiful editor. much more
  • ğŸ’° World Machine - Procedural terrain creation, simulations of nature, and interactive editing

Graphics / Voxel Editors

  • ğŸ‰ goxel (â­3k)
  • ğŸ†“ MagicaVoxel
  • ğŸ†“ Sproxel

Engines and Frameworks / Voxel Editors

  • ğŸ‰ Allegro - Allegro 4 & 5 are cross-platform, open source, game programming libraries, primarily for C and C++ developers.
  • ğŸ‰ amulet - A free Lua-based audio/visual toolkit suitable for small games and experimentation. It runs on Windows, Mac, Linux, HTML5 and iOS.
  • ğŸ‰ Astera (â­294) - 2D C99 Cross Platform Game Library / Framework
  • ğŸ‰ Azul3D - A 3D engine written in Go.
  • ğŸ‰ Babylon.js - Javascript 3D Library.
  • ğŸ‰ Bevy - A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust
  • ğŸ‰ bgfx (â­16k) - Cross-platform, graphics API agnostic, "Bring Your Own Engine/Framework" style rendering library.
  • ğŸ‰ bitsy - A little editor for little games or worlds. The goal is to make it easy to make games where you can walk around and talk to people and be somewhere.
  • ğŸ‰ Bladecoder (â­621) - Classic point and click adventure game engine and editor.
  • ğŸ’¸ Blend4Web - A Javascript framework for creating and displaying interactive 3D computer graphics in web browsers.
  • ğŸ‰ Blitz3D (â­265) 3D basic-like programming language for fast 3D desktop games.
  • ğŸ‰ Box2D - A 2D Physics Engine for Games.
  • ğŸ‰ Bullet - Real-time physics simulation.
  • ğŸ‰ Chipmunk C# (â­82) - C# implementation of the Chipmunk2D lib.
  • ğŸ‰ Chipmunk2D - A fast and lightweight 2D game physics library.
  • ğŸ‰ Cinder - Cinder is a community-developed, free and open source library for professional-quality creative coding in C++.
  • ğŸ‰ Cocos2D (â­636) - graphic library for games and multimedia, for python language
  • ğŸ‰ Cocos2d-x - a C++ OpenGL 2D and 3D game engine. Uses C++ but has JS and Lua bindings. Target all the major mobile platforms and operating systems. Additional tools CocoStudio and Cocos Code IDE.
  • ğŸ‰ Coquette - A micro framework for JavaScript games. Handles collision detection, the game update loop, canvas rendering, and keyboard and mouse input.
  • ğŸ‰ Dash (â­426) - A free and open 3D game engine written in D.
  • ğŸ‰ Dear Imgui (â­67k) - A bloat-free immediate mode GUI for C++ with minimal dependencies.
  • ğŸ‰ DEM Net Elevation API C# (â­325) - Terrain generation from real data with textures, normal maps, glTF, OBJ, STL support
  • ğŸ‰ Diligent Engine (â­3.9k) - A modern cross-platform low-level graphics library that supports Direct3D11, Direct3D12, OpenGL/GLES, and Vulkan.
  • ğŸ‰ E.B.U.R.P - The Eight-Bit Universal Role Playing Engine
  • ğŸ‰ ENGi (â­396) - A multi-platform 2D game library for Go.
  • ğŸ‰ engo - Engo is an open-source 2D game engine written in Go.
  • ğŸ‰ Ebiten - A dead simple 2D game library in Go.
  • ğŸ‰ ecs-lib (â­211) - ecs-lib is a tiny and easy to use ECS (Entity Component System) library for game programming. It's written in Typescript but you can use on node.js and web browser too.
  • ğŸ‰ Ejecta - A Fast, Open Source JavaScript, Canvas & Audio Implementation for iOS.
  • ğŸ‰ EnTT (â­11k) - Gaming meets modern C++, a fast and reliable entity-component system (ECS) and much more
  • ğŸ‰ FXGL (â­4.6k) - A JavaFX/Kotlin game engine for Win/Mac/Linux.
  • ğŸ‰ Farseer (â­705) - a collision detection system with realistic physics responses.
  • ğŸ‰ Flame (â­10k) - a minimalist game engine for Flutter
  • ğŸ‰ FlashPunk - free ActionScript 3 library designed for developing 2D Flash games.
  • ğŸ‰ gameplay - A free, open-source, cross-platform, 2D + 3D game framework written in C++. It is aimed towards indie game developers who are creating desktop and mobile games.
  • ğŸ’¸ GameSalad - Game Creation Engine for Mac and Windows.
  • ğŸ‰ GB Studio - A free and easy to use retro adventure game creator for your favourite handheld video game system.
  • ğŸ‰ GDevelop - An open-source, cross-platform 2D game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
  • ğŸ‰ ggez - A Rust library to create Good Games Easily.
  • ğŸ‰ Gideros - A Cross-Platform framework to create Mobile Apps and games for iOS, Android using Lua programming language.
  • ğŸ‰ Glide Engine (â­499) - Engine for making 2d games on iOS, macOS and tvOS in Swift programming language, with practical examples and tutorials.
  • ğŸ‰ Godot - An advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D open-source game engine.
  • ğŸ‰ Gorgon - A 2D rendering API for .NET, written in C#.
  • ğŸ‰ HaxeFlixel - Create cross-platform games easier and free.
  • ğŸ‰ Heaps - Cross platform graphics for high performance games.
  • ğŸ‰ Horde3D - small open source 3D rendering engine.
  • ğŸ‰ iio.js (â­455) - A javascript library that speeds the creation and deployment of HTML5 Canvas applications
  • ğŸ‰ ImpactJS - Impact is a JavaScript Game Engine that allows you to develop stunning HTML5 Games for desktop and mobile browsers.
  • ğŸ†“ Inform7 - A design system for interactive fiction based on natural language.
  • ğŸ‰ Ink - Scripting language for writing interactive narrative.
  • ğŸ‰ Irrlicht - open source high performance realtime 3D engine written in C++.
  • ğŸ‰ Jitter (â­45) - a fast and lightweight physics engine written in C#.
  • ğŸ‰ jMonkeyEngine 3 - a 3D open-source game engine for adventurous Java developers.
  • ğŸ‰ Juno (â­24) - Clean and lightweight 2D game framework written in TypeScript
  • ğŸ‰ Juno (â­168) - Framework for making 2D games with chunky pixels in Lua
  • ğŸ‰ Kivent - A 2D game framework for Kivy.
  • ğŸ‰ Kivy - Cross platform Python framework for creating apps and games for Linux, Windows, OS X, Android and iOS
  • ğŸ‰ KogGE - Modern Multiplatform Game Engine for Kotlin. Write games for the JVM, JavaScript, Android and iOS in no time using Kotlin.
  • ğŸ‰ LibGDX - Powerful (totally free) library for Java, code once and run the game on desktop, Android, Web, and iOS.
  • ğŸ‰ LimeJS - HTML5 game framework for building fast, native-experience games for all modern touchscreens and
  • ğŸ‰ LITIengine - 2D Java Game Engine. It provides all the infrastructure to create tile based 2D games with plain java
  • ğŸ‰ LumixEngine (â­3.6k) - 3D Game engine built on C++.
  • ğŸ‰ Lums (â­28) - A 2D / 3D framework written in C++11. Very efficient and modern. Still under heavy development.
  • ğŸ‰ LÃ–VE - Lua 2D Game Engine.
  • ğŸ‰ MINX (â­14) - Open Source 2D game framework written in C++ (to the style of XNA)

  • ğŸ‰ Matter.js - a 2D physics engine for the web.

  • ğŸ†“ NodeBox - a family of Python tools to create generative design.
  • ğŸ‰ Ã–bEngine (â­840) - 2D Game Engine with Lua Scripting made on top of SFML !

  • ğŸ‰ Phaser - free and fast 2D game framework for making HTML5 games for desktop and mobile web browsers, supporting Canvas and WebGL rendering.
  • ğŸ‰ Piston - a modular open source game engine written in Rust.
  • ğŸ‰ PixiJS - is a newcomer HTML5 game renderer - first released in early 2013. A main appeal of the engine is its use of WebGL for faster performance. If WebGL isn't supported, the engine falls back to standard canvas.
  • ğŸ‰ Planck.js - 2D JavaScript physics engine for cross-platform HTML5 game development.

  • ğŸ‰ Ren'Py - An open-source visual novel engine using the Python language in simplified form. It supports Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, Android and iOS.
  • ğŸ‰ Rpgboss - A 2d rpg game engine and editor based on scala and libgdx. Ease of use, with no programming knowledge.

  • ğŸ‰ Turbulenz - Turbulenz offers the ability to build, publish, iterate and monetise high-quality games that react like no others, with immersive 3D effects and real-time physics that open up a whole new world of unprecedented and extraordinary web content.
  • ğŸ‰ Twine - Downloadable or browser-based game development platform that allows users to create linked story paths. Not just text-based, Twine supports music, images, and sound effects. Very little coding knowledge required for basic text adventure games.
  • ğŸ’¸ Unity 3D - A development engine for the creation of 2D and 3D games and interactive content.
  • ğŸ‰ Urho3D - Cross-platform rendering and game engine.
  • ğŸ‰ ursina - A game engine powered by python and panda3d.
  • ğŸ‰ Vassal - Vassal is a game engine for building and playing online adaptations of board games and card games. Play live on the Internet or by email. Vassal runs on all platforms, and is free, open-source software.
